parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of query results. Valid values:

*   **zh-CN** (default): Chinese.
*   **en-US**: English.

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription.
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: DBClusterVersion
parameters.description: The version of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The zone ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
